text: Luis Adan Valbuena (November 30, 1985 - December 6, 2018) was a Venezuelan professional baseball infielder. He played eleven seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Seattle Mariners, Cleveland Indians, Chicago Cubs, Houston Astros and Los Angeles Angels. He was born in Zulia, Venezuela. Valbuena and Jos√© Castillo were killed in a car crash on December 6, 2018 in Yaracuy, Venezuela, aged 33. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Venezuelan baseball players Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Zulia
title: Luis Valbuena
